author: Fred Charlet
description: This ap√©ritif-style cocktail perfectly fits its name. That said, fans of Italian fizz will be interested to learn how well this spritz works when made with prosecco in place of champagne.
name: French Spritz
recipeIngredient: 40 ml Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)
90 ml Brut champagne or sparkling wine

recipeInstructions.text: POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass and lightly STIR
